medium: Pen and black ink, brush and blue wash
title: One of Two Designs for the Decoration of a Sword Scabbard
description: drawing is on asymmetric shaped paper, wider at top, narrower at bottom; male figure at center stands with large sword raised above head about to behead a large man laying on the ground before him; a village is seen in the distance as well as a small army of men with swords; two putti at top edge; mask at center bottom framed in decorative architectural details
